cards.rules_text:
[+1]: Mill three cards, then put a creature card from among them into your hand.
[-2]: You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature card with mana value less than or equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Tap an untapped creature you control: Return target creature card in your graveyard that shares a creature type with it to the battlefield.”

cards.rules_text:
Once during each of your turns, you may play an additional land or activate another Planeswalker's loyalty abilities an additional time.
[+1]: You may draw a card. If you do, each other player draws a card.
[+1]: You may gain 3 life. If you do, each other player gains 3 life.
[-7]: Return target noncreature permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
